<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop has a preheader if there is only one edge to the header of the loop</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Stable LoopInfo Analysis - Build a loop tree using stable iterators so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// result does / not depend on use list (block predecessor) order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Discover a subloop with the specified backedges such that: All blocks within</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this loop are mapped to this loop or a subloop. And all subloops within this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop have their parent loop set to this loop or a subloop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ReverseCFGWorklist.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an undiscovered block. Map it to the current loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a5b3fe20235340fb3bbf3ff86ec172d73"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a97de9fb6fdce68e4e31300fcf0e5a20c">changeLoopFor</a>(PredBB, L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredBB == L-&gt;getHeader())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push all block predecessors on the worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReverseCFGWorklist.insert(ReverseCFGWorklist.end(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                InvBlockTraits::child&#95;begin(PredBB),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                InvBlockTraits::child&#95;end(PredBB));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a discovered block. Find its outermost discovered loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subloop = Subloop-&gt;getOutermostLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it is already discovered to be a subloop of this loop, continue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subloop == L)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Discover a subloop of this loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subloop-&gt;setParentLoop(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumSubloops;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumBlocks += Subloop-&gt;getBlocksVector().capacity();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PredBB = Subloop-&gt;getHeader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue traversal along predecessors that are not loop-back edges from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// within this subloop tree itself. Note that a predecessor may directly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reach another subloop that is not yet discovered to be a subloop of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this loop, which we must traverse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadc93e5b694cde77f4a8a3695372b990">inverse&#95;children&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(PredBB)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(Pred) != Subloop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ReverseCFGWorklist.push&#95;back(Pred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().reserve(NumSubloops);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;reserveBlocks(NumBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Populate all loop data in a stable order during a single forward DFS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#a3950ceb42ead22a4228f0e55230dd3bc">PopulateLoopsDFS</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Top-level driver for the forward DFS within the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#a2e730539eeda2ae79f9f308fa42597ce"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#a2e730539eeda2ae79f9f308fa42597ce">PopulateLoopsDFS&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::traverse</a>(BlockT &#42;EntryBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#ac3d14bf8a797b33e7100f3dd8b905acf">insertIntoLoop</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Add a single Block to its ancestor loops in PostOrder. If the block is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// subloop header, add the subloop to its parent in PostOrder, then reverse the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Block and Subloop vectors of the now complete subloop to achieve RPO.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#ac3d14bf8a797b33e7100f3dd8b905acf"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/populateloopsdfs/#ac3d14bf8a797b33e7100f3dd8b905acf">PopulateLoopsDFS&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::insertIntoLoop</a>(BlockT &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LoopT &#42;Subloop = LI-&gt;getLoopFor(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subloop &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a> == Subloop-&gt;getHeader()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We reach this point once per subloop after processing all the blocks in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the subloop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Subloop-&gt;isOutermost())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Subloop-&gt;getParentLoop()-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().push&#95;back(Subloop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LI-&gt;addTopLevelLoop(Subloop);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For convenience, Blocks and Subloops are inserted in postorder. Reverse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lists, except for the loop header, which is always at the beginning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Subloop-&gt;reverseBlock(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::reverse(Subloop-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 Subloop-&gt;getSubLoopsVector().end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Subloop = Subloop-&gt;getParentLoop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; Subloop; Subloop = Subloop-&gt;getParentLoop())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Subloop-&gt;addBlockEntry(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Analyze LoopInfo discovers loops during a postorder DominatorTree traversal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// interleaved with backward CFG traversals within each subloop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (discoverAndMapSubloop). The backward traversal skips inner subloops, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this part of the algorithm is linear in the number of CFG edges. Subloop and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Block vectors are then populated during a single forward CFG traversal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (PopulateLoopDFS).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// During the two CFG traversals each block is seen three times:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1) Discovered and mapped by a reverse CFG traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2) Visited during a forward DFS CFG traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3) Reverse-inserted in the loop in postorder following forward DFS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The Block vectors are inclusive, so step 3 requires loop-depth number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// insertions per block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BlockT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a280d02be3ec3eb6527c1ea944d902775"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a280d02be3ec3eb6527c1ea944d902775">LoopInfoBase&lt;BlockT, LoopT&gt;::analyze</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a763915fd0a536cc2d1ebe99595e3eeaf">DomTreeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &amp;DomTree) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Postorder traversal of the dominator tree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &#42;DomRoot = DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a1dfeebf79b630b7c859bdbfd58a09c03">getRootNode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DomNode : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41c4916e8090ce40598db1a8dd2a5d5d">post&#95;order</a>(DomRoot)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BlockT &#42;Header = DomNode-&gt;getBlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BlockT &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Backedges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check each predecessor of the potential loop header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Backedge : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aadc93e5b694cde77f4a8a3695372b990">inverse&#95;children&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(Header)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Header dominates predBB, this is a new loop. Collect the backedges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase">DomTreeNodeBase&lt;BlockT&gt;</a> &#42;BackedgeNode = DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#ad8295b9b507d1d847cd46856f8255eab">getNode</a>(Backedge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BackedgeNode &amp;&amp; DomTree.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a5d344fb542e2d57c633f0161e3a6b231">dominates</a>(DomNode, BackedgeNode))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Backedges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Backedge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a8a10d542acf3418b2a5bfefb351829c0"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform a backward CFG traversal to discover and map blocks in this loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Backedges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LoopT &#42;L = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a5a0ae49bf720341774a25029fd23bf59">AllocateLoop</a>(Header);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aed9f16ed8eafe53615ea3fb09fd9e0eb">discoverAndMapSubloop</a>(L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BlockT &#42;&gt;</a>(Backedges), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, DomTree);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
